name: Cross-linked reaction product of polyvinyl alcohol (PVOH)
and tetraethoxysilane (TEOS)
FoodContactSubstance: Cross-linked reaction product of polyvinyl alcohol (PVOH) (CAS Reg. No. 9002-89-5) and tetraethoxysilane (TEOS) (CAS Reg. No. 78-10-4), coupled with the trimethoxysilane-based coupling agent described in the notification.
